subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Wave table info
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Yeah, the child thing makes sense, and what they say veries, but they say 
she's only 17, (perpetually?).


>From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Wave table info
>Date: Fri, 23 Feb 2007 09:52:49 -0800 (PST)
>
>Yeah I know what ya mean. Ive been so busy with work myself I havent had 
>much time to do anything lately.
>
>   Adding FM will be interesting.
>
>   I can hear that pretty clear and only difference I had was at the end I 
>hear "child princess".
>
>   Misty
>
>Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>           I'm so busy withe boxes, I haven't had much time to mess with 
>extra stuff. I
>just ordered some new chips last night so I can add FM as an additional
>sound source.
>
>There's a lot of darkside interaction, and if you start getting a workable
>system up and running you get those voices that try to either scare you 
>off,
>or distract you from the real stuff. The darkheads don't want this stuff to
>work, preferring humans stay in fear, and fear of death is the most 
>powerful
>fear to have. The manipulations can be very subtle. I don't want to get
>distracted on other systems till I have a PCB made, and a production system
>out there.
>I have an idea for a Spiricom like device using audio tones, instead of
>using radio as a sound source, I think I can adapt my system to it, using
>the random vlotage gnerator to sweep an audio VCO using the Intersil 8038
>chip. This voice was using a tone generator I had built into one of the
>receivers years ago, and mixed it with the radio noise.You can hear the 
>1000
>hz sqaurewave tone in the background.
>
>Frank
>
